segments.text: En , I am looking for the shop . Can you tell me where it is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Walk along the way and then turn left , It's right there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Do I have to pay duty if I want to buy something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you don't have to . It's a duty-free shop .
segments.speaker: S1
